com.bigdata.relation.rule.eval

Interface IRuleTaskFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRuleTaskFactory, RunRuleAndFlushBufferTaskFactory

    public interface IRuleTaskFactory
extends Serializable
    A factory for objects that handle the execution of an IRule. This interface is Serializable since instances of the interface must travel with the IRule to which they are attached.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IStepTask newTask(IRule rule, IJoinNexus joinNexus, IBuffer<ISolution[]> buffer)
      The object will be used to evaluate the rule for the IRule.

    • Method Detail

      • newTask

        IStepTask newTask(IRule rule,
                IJoinNexus joinNexus,
                IBuffer<ISolution[]> buffer)
        The object will be used to evaluate the rule for the IRule.
        Parameters:
        rule - The rule (MAY have been specialized since it was declared).
        joinNexus - Encapsulates various important information required for join operations.
        buffer - The buffer onto which chunks of computed ISolutions for the IRule must be written.
        Returns:
        null unless custom evaluation is desired.
